00016 /**
00017  * Class-registry, a pseudo-singleton wrapper. Used to memorize and return all classes we did already instanciate.
00018  * @package kata_internal
00019  */
00020 class classRegistry {
00021 
00022     /**
00023      * array to save objects of any classed created
00024      * @var array
00025      */
00026     static protected $objects = array();
00027 
00028     /**
00029      * return an instance of the class given in $name. If the class does not exist yet, create it.
00030      *
00031      * @param string $name name of the class to return an instance of
00032      * @param string $key to create the same class more than once. uses simple caching to return consistency
00033      */
00034     static function &getObject($name,$key='') {
00035         $objname = $name.(empty($key)?'':'/').$key;
00036 
00037         if (!isset(self::$objects[$objname])) {
00038              self::$objects[$objname]=new $name;
00039         }
00040         return self::$objects[$objname];
00041     }
00042 
00043     /**
00044      * check if we already registered given classname
00045      *
00046      * @param string $name name of the class to return an instance of
00047      * @param string $key to create the same class more than once
00048      * @return bool
00049      */
00050     static function hasObject($name,$key='') {
00051         $objname = $name.(empty($key)?'':'/').$key;
00052         return isset(self::$objects[$objname]);
00053     }
00054 
00055     /**
00056      * return all classes in the cache. used for debugging
00057      * @return array cache-array
00058      */
00059     static function getLoadedClasses() {
00060         return self::$objects;
00061     }
00062 
00063 }
